languages.text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g} дистанционной атакой по цели, находящейся в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытии{/g}, данная атака всегда совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This visor decreases the enemy's cover efficiency by −<u>(2 × distance to them)</u> (maximum 30%).

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g}.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

languages.text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g} дистанционной атакой по цели, находящейся в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытии{/g}, попадание всегда становится {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадает{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой по цели, находящейся в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытии{/g}, данная атака всегда совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}.
Понижает эффективность укрытия противника на <u>(2 × расстояние до противника)</u>% (максимум 30%).

languages.text: 当装备者使用远程攻击，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}藏在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面的敌人时，此次攻击必然会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这块面甲会降低敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}，降幅为<u>（2×与敌人的距离）</u>，最多降低30%。

当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}藏在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面的敌人时，此次攻击必然会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un objetivo que está a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g} con un ataque a distancia, el ataque siempre inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El visor reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} del enemigo en −<u>(2 × distancia a él)</u> (máximo de 30 %).

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の中にいるターゲットに遠距離攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させると、この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このバイザーは、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}を-<u>(2 × それらとの距離)</u>(最小30%)減少させる。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいるターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当てる{/g}と、この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger ein Ziel in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} mit einem Fernkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erzielt dieser Angriff immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Visier senkt die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} des Feindes um −<u>(2 × Entfernung zum Feind)</u> (maximal 30%).

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g} avec une attaque à distance, cette attaque porte automatiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette visière diminue l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de la couverture{/g} de l'ennemi de -<u>(2 × distance de cet ennemi)</u> (30 % maximum).

languages.text: Takan kişi, menzilli bir saldırıyla {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperdeki{/g} bir hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} bu saldırı her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
